import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import { useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom' const Form1 = () => { const [reg,setreg] = useState(""); const [pass,setpass] = useState(""); const [password,setpassword] = useState(""); const [lreg,setlreg] = useState(""); const [lpassword,setlpassword] = useState(""); const navigate = useNavigate(); return (

setlreg(event.target.value)} placeholder="Teacher id" id="Email"/> setlpassword(String(event.target.value))} placeholder="Password" id="Password"/>

) } export default Form1
